name: part_010
file: tmp_【＃不知火フレア2周年記念ライブ】３D LIVE！みんなで沢山盛り上がろう！【不知火フレア⧸ホロライブ】 [ZMlPAsIJslA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Shiranui Flare thanks the guests who performed with her and announces the start of her solo performance section.
The stage transitions as the lights dim and change for the upcoming song performance.
Shiranui Flare performs the song 'Tsuyogari', the ending theme from the anime 'Zatch Bell!'.

subtitles.original: 普段仲良くしていただいてる方を今回お呼びさせていただきました。
subtitles.english: I invited those I usually get along well with this time.

subtitles.original: みんな、本当にありがとうね！
subtitles.english: Everyone, thank you so much!

subtitles.original: 遊びに来てくれて、一緒に歌ってくれて、本当にありがとうねー！
subtitles.english: Thank you so much for coming and singing with me!

subtitles.original: ということでね、ここからは、またソロパートに戻っていきます。
subtitles.english: So, from here on, we're going back to the solo part.

subtitles.original: 私一人になってしまったけれども...
subtitles.english: I'm by myself now, but...

subtitles.original: みんなも一緒に盛り上がってくれたら嬉しいです！
subtitles.english: ...I'd be happy if everyone gets excited with me!

subtitles.original: えー、次の曲はですね...
subtitles.english: Um, the next song is...

subtitles.original: ガッシュから、あの、「金色のガッシュベル!!」から...
subtitles.english: ...from Gash, um, from "Zatch Bell!"...

subtitles.original: えー、エンディングテーマ、歌いたいなと思っております。
subtitles.english: ...um, I'd like to sing the ending theme.

subtitles.original: 聞いてください。
subtitles.english: Please listen.

subtitles.original: 「つよがり」。
subtitles.english: "Tsuyogari".

subtitles.original: つよがり / 作詞 福田 哲也 / 作曲 緒 誠二
subtitles.english: Show of Strength / Lyrics: Tetsuya Fukuda / Composition: Seiji Ko

subtitles.original: 放課後の校舎 柔らかな光
subtitles.english: The school building after school, the soft light...

subtitles.original: 長い影二つ 寄り添い少し照れてる
subtitles.english: Two long shadows, snuggling together, feeling a little shy.

subtitles.original: 泣きたいくせに 平気な顔で
subtitles.english: Even though you want to cry, with an unperturbed face...

subtitles.original: 胸を張る君を 頼りにしてるよ
subtitles.english: ...you puff out your chest, and I'm counting on you.

subtitles.original: つよがりじゃなくて 素直な気持ち
subtitles.english: It's not a show of strength, just my honest feelings...

subtitles.original: 見せてほしいよ 私だけに
subtitles.english: ...I want you to show me, only to me.

subtitles.original: 深呼吸して そんなに解けない言葉
subtitles.english: Take a deep breath, words that aren't so easily unraveled...

subtitles.original: 君が大好き
subtitles.english: I love you.

subtitles.original: 忘れないでいて 誰かが聞いたら
subtitles.english: Please don't forget, if someone asks...

subtitles.original: 笑い飛ばされてもいい 輝く君だけの夢
subtitles.english: ...it's okay to be laughed at, your own shining dream.

subtitles.original: 生まれ変わっても 必ず
subtitles.english: Even if we're reborn, for sure...

subtitles.original: 出会える二人だよ そう信じてる
subtitles.english: ...the two of us will meet again, that's what I believe.

subtitles.original: 諦めないで 約束だから
subtitles.english: Please don't give up, because it's a promise...

subtitles.original: 私も少し つよがりだね
subtitles.english: ...I'm also a little bit of a "show of strength", aren't I?

subtitles.original: 二人が描く それぞれの未来に 向かって
subtitles.english: Heading towards the respective futures that the two of us imagine...

subtitles.original: 走って行こう
subtitles.english: ...let's run together.

subtitles.original: つよがりじゃなくて 素直な気持ち
subtitles.english: It's not a show of strength, just my honest feelings...

subtitles.original: 見せてほしいよ 私だけに
subtitles.english: ...I want you to show me, only to me.

subtitles.original: 深呼吸して そんなに解けない言葉
subtitles.english: Take a deep breath, words that aren't so easily unraveled...

subtitles.original: 君が大好き
subtitles.english: I love you.
